hero.title:
CORVO
INDIE
hero.description: I develop games focused on branching stories, where there is no right or wrong path — only consequences. Every decision you make changes the plot and unlocks unique endings.

features.accessible_desc: Run on any phone or PC. Play the prologue FOR FREE directly in your browser, without installing anything.

catalog.title: Available Catalog
catalog.game_subtitle: A runaway succubus who wants to live as a human being, with monogamous values.

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.solo_desc: Corvo Indie is a solo project, led by a single person. My commitment is to create quality stories, but development timelines may vary as the games do not yet generate enough income for me to dedicate myself to them full-time.
notes.updates_desc: Games receive weekly or monthly updates, depending on time availability. Keep an eye on the catalog (and social media) for new demos and chapters!
notes.social_desc: Follow development and suggest ideas on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube and X. Your opinion helps shape the future of our games!
